      • performClick

        public boolean performClick()

      • setButtonSize

        public void setButtonSize(int widthArg,
                          int heightArg)
        Set the size of this button. If this method is not invoked from the Activity, the button will assume a default size of 100 x 100. In any event, the text displayed in the button is given the size width / 3. The button path is initialized from the width and height parameter.
        Parameters:
        widthArg - The width of the button in pixels.
        heightArg - The height of the button in pixels.

      • setButtonText

        public void setButtonText(java.lang.String buttonTextArg)
        Set the text for this button.
        Parameters:
        buttonTextArg - The text that appears in the button.
